articles.description: A study published in the journal Science Translational Medicine suggests there were actually 8.7 million cases during a three week period in March, compared to the roughly 100,000 cases officially reported during that time.
articles.content: A new study suggests the number of coronavirus cases in the U.S. in March could have been 80 times greater and doubled nearly twice as fast than originally reported, amounting to more than 8.7 millio… [+3532 chars]
